betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Warp is categorized into three main types, each obtained through different means and with distinct characteristics. Here is a simplified explanation:

§5Temporary Warp§r
Sources:
Eating Zombie Brains.
Conducting Eldritch research at the Research Table.
Using Eldritch Artifacts or Blood-related items.
Being observed by Eldritch Wardens or Eldritch Jailers through their Death Gaze.
Remaining near a Rift during its collapse.

Behavior:
Temporary Warp is always reduced during Warp Events.
It can also be entirely removed using Purifying Soap.
§5Standard (Sticky) Warp§r
Sources:
Conducting Eldritch research at the Research Table.
Using Eldritch Artifacts.
Crafting items like the Brain in a Jar.
Staying near a Rift during its collapse.
Behavior:
Standard Warp may occasionally decrease during Warp Events.
Using Purifying Soap under strict conditions can potentially reduce up to 2 points of Standard Warp.
§5Permanent Warp§r
Sources:
Unlocking Forbidden Knowledge (marked by a purple smoky aura in the Thaumonomicon).
Behavior:
Permanent Warp is irreversible and represents the deepest corruption of the soul.
It cannot be reduced by any normal means.
In this modpack, there is only one way to reduce Permanent Warp, but it is a late-game option.
§5Equipment Warp§r
Description:
Equipment Warp is technically a form of Permanent Warp that can be manually adjusted.
It is tied to the equipment or items you carry.
Behavior:
Warp from equipment is only active when the item is held or equipped.
Removing or unequipping the item will eliminate the associated Warp.
Warp represents the consequences of delving too deeply into forbidden magic, with each type affecting gameplay differently.
